SELECT pur.pur_id AS pur_id , pur.purdate AS purdate , user.name AS name , sal.sales_nm AS sales_nm , ll.sumcnt AS price_sum , sal.price AS price , purinfo.pur_cnt AS pur_cnt , (sal.price*purinfo.pur_cnt) AS price_cnt , purinfo.returnYN AS returnYN , purinfo.wanted_date AS wanted_date , pur.depositYN AS depositYN , sal.sales_id AS sales_id , user.loginID AS loginID FROM tb_purchase pur inner join tb_userinfo user ON pur.loginID = user.loginID inner join tb_purchaseinfo purinfo ON pur.pur_id = purinfo.pur_id inner join tb_sales sal ON purinfo.sales_id = sal.sales_id left outer join ( select st.sales_id , sum(st_cnt) as sumcnt from tb_stock st where st.sales_id IN ( select sa.sales_id from tb_sales sa ) group by st.sales_id ) ll on ll.sales_id = purinfo.sales_id
and returnYN='Y'
and returnYN='N'
and (pur.purdate >= #{datesearch1} and pur.purdate <= (select date_add(date_format(#{datesearch2}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)) )
and (pur.purdate >= #{datesearch1} and pur.purdate <= (select date_add(date_format(#{datesearch2}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)) )
order by pur.purdate desc LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT tp.pur_id AS pur_id, date_format(tp.purdate,'%Y-%m-%d') AS purdate, tu.name, SUM(tpi.pur_cnt) AS pur_cnt_total, SUM(ts.price*tpi.pur_cnt) AS total_price, tp.depositYN, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_purchaseinfo tpi2 WHERE tpi2.pur_id=tp.pur_id AND tpi.returnYN = 'Y') > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS returnYN FROM tb_purchase tp JOIN tb_userinfo tu ON tp.loginID=tu.loginID JOIN tb_purchaseinfo tpi ON tpi.pur_id=tp.pur_id JOIN tb_sales ts ON ts.sales_id=tpi.sales_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT st.sales_id, sum(st_cnt) AS sumcnt FROM tb_stock st GROUP BY st.sales_id ) ll ON ll.sales_id=tpi.sales_id
AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_refundinfo tri WHERE tri.purinf_id=tpi.purinf_id) > 0
AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_refundinfo tri WHERE tri.purinf_id=tpi.purinf_id)=0
and (tp.purdate >= #{datesearch1} and tp.purdate <= (select date_add(date_format(#{datesearch2}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)) )
and (tp.purdate >= #{datesearch1} and tp.purdate <= (select date_add(date_format(#{datesearch2}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)) )
GROUP BY tp.pur_id ORDER BY tp.purdate DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(alias.pur_id) FROM ( SELECT tp.pur_id FROM tb_purchase tp JOIN tb_userinfo tu ON tp.loginID=tu.loginID JOIN tb_purchaseinfo tpi ON tpi.pur_id=tp.pur_id JOIN tb_sales ts ON ts.sales_id=tpi.sales_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT st.sales_id, sum(st_cnt) AS sumcnt FROM tb_stock st GROUP BY st.sales_id ) ll ON ll.sales_id=tpi.sales_id
AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_refundinfo tri WHERE tri.purinf_id=tpi.purinf_id) > 0
AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_refundinfo tri WHERE tri.purinf_id=tpi.purinf_id)=0
and (tp.purdate >= #{datesearch1} and tp.purdate <= (select date_add(date_format(#{datesearch2}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)) )
and (tp.purdate >= #{datesearch1} and tp.purdate <= (select date_add(date_format(#{datesearch2}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)) )
GROUP BY tp.pur_id ) alias;

SELECT pur.pur_id, pur.depositYN, sal.sales_nm, pinfo.purinf_id, pinfo.pur_cnt, pinfo.returnYN, sal.price*pinfo.pur_cnt AS price_sum, tri.return_cnt, trd.confirmYN FROM tb_purchaseinfo pinfo JOIN tb_purchase pur ON pinfo.pur_id = pur.pur_id JOIN tb_userinfo user ON user.loginID = pur.loginID JOIN tb_sales sal ON sal.sales_id = pinfo.sales_id LEFT JOIN tb_refundinfo tri ON pinfo.purinf_id=tri.purinf_id LEFT JOIN tb_returndir trd on trd.rfinfo_id =tri.rfinfo_id WHERE pur.pur_id = #{pur_id}
SELECT del.deliv_id FROM tb_purchase pur JOIN tb_purchaseinfo pinfo ON pur.pur_id = pinfo.pur_id JOIN tb_delivdir del ON del.purinf_id = pinfo.purinf_id WHERE pur.pur_id = #{pur_id}

SELECT pur.pur_id FROM tb_purchase pur JOIN tb_purchaseinfo pinfo ON pur.pur_id = pinfo.pur_id JOIN tb_refundinfo rinfo ON pinfo.purinf_id = rinfo.purinf_id JOIN tb_returndir rdir ON rdir.rfinfo_id = rinfo.rfinfo_id WHERE pur.pur_id = #{pur_id}
